website_summaries.verdict: If you can live without its hit-or-miss motion alert feature, the Ezviz Mini is an otherwise ideal, no-fuss DIY security cam available at a great price.
pros: At just $70, the Ezviz Mini offers an exceptional value and solid specs, including high-definition live streaming video
cons: Too many false motion alerts made the feature essentially unusable
The camera doesn't integrate with any third-party products or services

customer_reviews.title: I have tried Amcrest, Zmodo, Arlo and now EZVIZ...

EZVIZ has the best app user interface and by far, the best customer service. Excellent quality product, excellent HD resolution and an app that actually works! product_meta.title: 1080P WIFI INDR CAM PNK
product_meta.description:
Color:Pink| Style:1 Camera KitThe Mini Plus is an indoor HD 1080p smart home Wi-Fi camera that’s perfect for watching your pet while you’re at work or your baby in their nursery.

Connect and Share
Stay connected when you’re not home. Receive motion alerts on your phone to keep track of what's happening. Take photos and record footage any time you want with the EZVIZ app, while easily saving or sharing on social media from your smartphone. 

"Alexa Show me the Living Room"
With the EZVIZ skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Mini Plus using your voice through Alexa and Echo Show.

Storage
(1) Local storage up to 128GB MicroSD card to save video.
(2) 7-day and 30-day cloud storage options, with free 30 day trial. 
(3) Use all of the above for duplicate backups of your video. 

Add-On
Adding as many cameras as you want is easy and visible all in one app, for your home or small business. The Mini Plus runs on EZVIZ's adaptable platform, which adds new features and functionality as they become available with easy one-click updates.

Requirements
High-Speed Internet Connection (1.5Mbps+)
Mobile OS: iOS 7.0+ (iPhone, iPad), Android 4.0+
Connectivity: Wi-Fi 2.4 GHz (802.11 b/g/n) or 5GHz b/g/n/ac

Setup
(1) Download EZVIZ app on iOS 7.0+ (iPhone, iPad), Android 4.0+.
(2) Have smartphone or tablet on same 2.4GHz or 5.0GHz network as camera.
(3) Create an account and follow easy and quick setup steps in app. 
*Please ensure to update your device firmware from the EZVIZ APP upon initial setup and check back regularly for future updates.

ALEXA Skills Setup
(1) Select the “Enable Skill” button in the Alexa APP to link your EZVIZ account and discover your device.
(2) Select a suitable name for your camera in the EZVIZ APP.
(3) Discover your camera in the Alexa APP.
*Image Encryption must be turned off from your camera settings in the EZVIZ APP to properly connect with Alexa.

Package Contents:
1 x Pink Mini Plus with Stand
1 x Metal Mounting Plate
1 x Adhesive Foam 
1 x Screw Kit
1 x Power Adapter
1 x Quick Start Guide
